allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix ElevenLabs webhook transcript parsing

- Extract conversation data from nested ''data'' object in webhook payload
- Correctly access call_duration from metadata.call_duration_secs
- Handle transcript as array of message objects with role and message fields
- Add improved logging to show transcript preview and message count

ElevenLabs post-call webhooks nest all conversation data under the ''data'' object,
with call duration inside metadata. This fix ensures transcripts and metadata are
properly extracted and saved to Firestore.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix frontend transcript parsing from ElevenLabs webhook format

- Update scoreInterview to handle ElevenLabs transcript array format
- Map role names: ''agent'' -> ''ai'', ''user'' -> ''candidate''
- Extract message text from ''message'' field in ElevenLabs format
- Add error logging for debugging transcript fetch issues

The ElevenLabs webhook sends transcripts as an array of objects with
role, message, and time_in_call_secs fields. Updated mapping to match
the actual webhook payload structure.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
